Method Detail

getCurrencyCode

String getCurrencyCode()
Currency code.

Returns:
Returns the currency code.

setCurrencyCode

void setCurrencyCode(String currencyCode)
Sets the currency code. The currency code should correspond to a three letter code acceptable by java.util.Currency#getInstance(String).
Empty or null values will lead to the automatic selection of the default currency of the environment's default Locale.

Parameters:
currencyCode - New currency code.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - for malformed currency codes.

getAmount

Gets the amount.

Returns:
Returns the amount.

setAmount

Sets the amount.

Parameters:
amount - New amount.
